entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
